extendedInfo.description: ToMarket is a fun and easy to use shopping app. The All->Need->Cart listings make it a snap for you to go ToMarket!"Hands Down The Best"*Categories/Aisles/Rating/Stores*Quantity/Cost/Units*Sort/Filter*Coupons*Multi-list*Barcode Scanning*Inventory*HandyShopper like*Wine Lists*ToDo Lists*Reminders - Date driven reminders for items in list*Gift Lists*DVD and Blu-Ray Movie Lists*Inventory*Per-Store Prices*Best Deal Calculator*Shopping App - Grocery AppFully Customizable â Choose which features to use, which items to display.Bar Code Scanning â Add items to list by scanning the barcode, once in the list scan to move it to need or cart.Voice Recognition â Search for items on your list and easily move it to need or cart. Add items by saying "NEED apples AND oranges AND bacon" or "ADD bacon"Email or Text â Use email or text to share your list with someone else in Full version.Coupons â Track which items you have coupons for.Price Your List â Save money by tracking the cost of all items on your need list or in your cart.Import/Export Data â Easily export and import your data to and from your SD card.Modify CSV List â Copy export file from your SD card to your computer, make edits and then import back into ToMarket on your Android device.Create Multiple Lists â Stay organized with lists for everything you need: groceries, movies, wine, tasks, books, gifts, pantry, collections, etc. HandyShopper and SplashShopper converters available at http://www.tomarketweb.com/dnn/GettingStarted/ConvertingFromHandyShopperorSplashShopper.aspxReviews"This app + the right store = shopping fun. It's so not a chore anymore!""I use this app daily - simple & does exactly what I was looking for in a grocery list app.""Best shopping list on the market...I've tried them all.""Hands down, the best shopping app for Android.""I've tried a lot of different shopping list apps and this one is by far the best of them all. As it says on the label, this is almost like HandyShopper""Honestly is the best on the market.""I've tried several shopping apps and this is by far the best and most thorough.""Best replacement for HandyShopper on Palm""Amazing flexibility""Best shopping list I've found!""Better than Grocery King and SplashShopper and all the rest"Get ToMarket PRO For No 50 Item LimitExport before upgrade

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I hade made a nice list on my previous phone that I exportedand saved. But now I can\'t get that backed up list in to this HTC DNA !
reviews.author: Joe C

reviews.title: I like!
reviews.comment: I would share this on facebook if the option were there.
reviews.author: Cheymamma Storey

reviews.comment: Can not pull items back up
reviews.author: Sabra Chrisawn

reviews.title: Great App. Except!
reviews.comment: The first thing I would have added is the ability to sync between devices. Every others shopping list I use does this. It is the only thing keeping me from purchasing the paid app. and using this exclusively. With others apps, family members  can put items on the list while I am at the store. And they can put items on the list without having to tell me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Loaded super fast and then did absolutely NOTHING!  couldn\'t click anything ... useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow but still very good.
reviews.comment: Best feature list out there for this kind of shopping app. I uninstalled it when it started to get buggy but gave it a second chance couple months later.   Very stable but unfortunately still slow to load and move between screens.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Id give it no stars if I could
reviews.comment: Samsung galaxy s2. I opened it and it wouldnt function at All! Just showed a default picture of a shopping list. Total BS! Uninstalled!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t do anything
reviews.comment: Nothing  just a picture
reviews.author: Louis Evans

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: The best Android replacement for HandyShopper. Will give 5 stars when shopping list sync between devices is possible...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap App!!!
reviews.comment: The app sux! Backups don\'t restore after an OS or phone upgrade! Lame dev won\'t even respond to emails! Uninstall!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Froze the first time I opened it. When I finally got in, it looked really dodgy anyway. Uninstalled straight away
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best shopping app!!
reviews.comment: Great feature list,  Simple but powerful and configurable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App didn\'t even start...
reviews.comment: I downloaded this application twice and both times the opening screen goes dim and the app freezes. Too bad, I was looking forward to it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: when starting.  No way to use the app.  Too bad, looked like it might replace Handy Shopper on Palm.  *Edit* just tried it again and after all these months still locks up my device.  Can the dev not offer any help?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT Cool
reviews.comment: Info made it sound like there was a barcode reader included of the app. NONE included. Uninstalled!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best.
reviews.comment: This is what I was looking for in a shopping app, and I\'ve done my research. Dev listens to requests - has had barcode scan forever.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t exit the app.
reviews.comment: Its ok. The top tabs looked a bit cramped which needs a bit more space under the text. The main issue is that the app wont exit properly. The screen goes dim and the app just hangs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: when trying to exit app. Won\'t let me exit. Otherwise interesting app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Similar to Handy Shopper
reviews.comment: Sucks!  Only allows two aisles and 50 items.  It does have a barcode scanner feature that Handy Shopper didn\'t. Not as user friendly, not upgrading!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: the only problem I\'m having is the items wont save and show up unless I put the isle
